Quotes: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
Author: Anatole France

Quotes: Apparently there is nothing that cannot happen today.
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: Every day I try to be in communication with the universe in an unconscious way.
Author: Paulo Coelho

Quotes: To see the world in a grain of sand, and to see heaven in a wild flower, hold infinity in the palm of your hands, and eternity in an hour.
Author: William Blake
